name: JAMBO XL 20Ft Premium Slip Splash and Slide with 3 Bodyboards, Heavy Duty Water Slide- Advanced 3-Way Water Sprinkler System, Backyard Waterslide Outdoor Water Toys n Slides for Kids Splash Pad
short_description: 💧Splash into summer and bring on the summer water adventures with this beautifully designed water soaker slip splash and slide. With vivid colors reminiscent of a bright summer day, this water slide will give kids vibes of good summer times, the ocean, sun, water, cotton candy and lots of good memories.

💧There are sprinkler holes all around both sides of the slide that are specially designed to give maximum wetness, for maximum fun. This amazing backyard toy has great water coverage over the whole slide, which will keep kids sliding fast, and eager to soak up the water fun.

💧Our extra long, wide, three- lane water slide gives kids a way funner sliding experience, where they get the chance to splash around and slide at once for hours and hours of water fun. Less time spent waiting around for a turn- and more time spent sliding and having an awesome time with family and friends. Three kids can slide at once with our blow-up water park. They can have races to see who’s faster, splash around or show off new tricks they learned on the boogie board.
💧3- 27 x 20 bodyboards, 4 slide anchors and repair patches are some of the great accessories you'll get with the JAMBO Summer Vibes Slip Splash and Slide!

💧The Jambo slip splash and slide water slide is designed with safety in mind. ASTM and CPSIA certified, our waterslide is BPA and phthalates free. This outdoor water toy also has a crash pad at the end of the slide to slow children down and ensure safety.

💧We researched and tested other slides to see how we could make improvements. Our lawn tarp slide is made from thick, industrial-grade PVC that is much stronger than most lawn water slides on the market.
